archimate:Node.name: Databasemanagementsysteem
archimate:Node.documentation: Ondersteunt het beheren van gestructureerde gegevens.

properties.value: Oracle Database (http://www.oracle.com/us/products/database/overview/index.html), Oracle MySQL (http://www.oracle.com/us/products/mysql/overview/index.html), IBM DB2 (http://www-01.ibm.com/software/data/db2/), Microsoft SQL Server (http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/sqlserver/default.aspx)
